trans-unit.source: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用者從一組選項中選取單一選項，與其他 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控制項搭配。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control can display text, an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, or both.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項可以顯示的文字， <xref:System.Drawing.Image>，或兩者。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects one option button (also known as a radio button) within a group, the others clear automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取一個選項按鈕 （也稱為選項按鈕） 群組內時，會自動清除其他。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls in a given container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, constitute a group.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項中指定的容器，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，構成一組。

trans-unit.source: To create multiple groups on one form, place each group in its own container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立多個群組一個，加上每個群組其本身的容器，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls have a similar function: they offer choices a user can select or clear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項有類似的功能： 他們提供使用者可以選取或清除的選項。

trans-unit.source: The difference is that multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls can be selected at the same time, but option buttons are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 其差異在於，多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>可以選取控制項，在相同的時間，但是是互斥的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property to get or set the state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>屬性來取得或設定狀態的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: The option button's appearance can be altered to appear as a toggle-style button or as a standard option button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 選項按鈕的外觀可以更改設定切換樣式按鈕或是以標準選項按鈕出現<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckedChanged> event to track which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is selected and reports the text of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> when the user clicks a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckedChanged>要追蹤的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>已選取，並報告的選取文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>當使用者按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼在 Windows Form 中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Call `InitializeRadioButtons` from the form's constructor or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeRadioButtons`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default view of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> has its text aligned to the right of the button and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設檢視<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>具有其文字對齊右邊的按鈕和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>, gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property to `false`, and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>，因而提供給它的切換按鈕的外觀，設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>屬性`false`，並將它加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining the appearance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，決定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 的外觀。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A> value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Normal>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is drawn with a circular check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Normal>，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>繪製控制項的循環的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is drawn as a control that can be toggled to an up or down state.
trans-unit.target: 如果值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button>，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>繪製為控制項，可以切換為開啟或關閉狀態。

trans-unit.source: Either type can display text, an image, or both.
trans-unit.target: 其中一種類型可以顯示文字、 影像，或兩者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>, gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property to `false`, and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>、 提供切換控制項的外觀、 設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>屬性`false`，並將它加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AppearanceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AppearanceChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> named `RadioButton1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>名為`RadioButton1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AppearanceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AppearanceChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> value and the appearance of the control automatically change when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出當按一下控制項時，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> 值和控制項的外觀是否自動變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> value and the appearance of the control automatically change on the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> 值和控制項的外觀會在 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> 事件上自動變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> value is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> portion of the control must be checked in code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>值設定為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項部分必須簽入中的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control group, this property ensures that only one of the controls is checked at a given time.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>屬於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項群組，這個屬性可確保只有其中一個控制項會檢查在指定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `false`, a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls will not act as a mutually exclusive group and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property must be updated in code.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>屬性設定為`false`、 群組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項將不會當做互斥的群組和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>必須更新程式碼中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>, gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property to `false`, and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>、 提供切換控制項的外觀、 設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>屬性`false`，並將它加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the check box portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 的核取方塊部分的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the valid <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckAlign%2A> property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckAlign%2A>屬性可以在執行階段變更。

trans-unit.source: The check box portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is moved to the right or left of the text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> value changes.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>移動或向右文字的左邊時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>值變更。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control has been instantiated on a form and that a reference to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace has been included.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制具現化，表單上的參考<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間已包含在內。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否選取控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the check box is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果核取方塊被選取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example evaluates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> selection and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會評估<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>選取範圍和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: When a specified item is selected from the list box, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.PerformClick%2A> method of another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is called.
trans-unit.target: 從清單方塊中，選取指定的項目時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.PerformClick%2A>另一個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> have been instantiated on a form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>具現化表單上。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckAlign%2A> property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckAlign%2A>屬性可以在執行階段變更。

trans-unit.source: The check box portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is moved to the right or left of the text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> value changes.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>移動或向右文字的左邊時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>值變更。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control has been instantiated on a form and that a reference to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace has been included.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制具現化，表單上的參考<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間已包含在內。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有明確呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，將會在參考 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> 屬性時呼叫該方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the <xref:Accessibility> assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入參考<xref:Accessibility>安裝.NET framework 組件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> in a derived class, you should not call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance" />在衍生類別中，您不應該呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> with a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> of 104 and a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> of 24.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 為 104 且 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> 為 24 的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.DoubleClick> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick>樣式位元會設為`false`如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.DoubleClick>不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者用滑鼠按兩下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.MouseDoubleClick> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick>樣式位元會設為`false`如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.MouseDoubleClick>不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckAlign%2A> property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.CheckAlign%2A>屬性可以在執行階段變更。

trans-unit.source: The check box portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is moved to the right or left of the text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> value changes.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>移動或向右文字的左邊時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>值變更。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control has been instantiated on a form and that a reference to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace has been included.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制具現化，表單上的參考<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間已包含在內。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>屬性設定為`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the user enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control by using the arrow keys, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者輸入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項使用方向鍵，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnMouseUp%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnMouseUp%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Generates a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event for the control, simulating a click by a user.
trans-unit.target: 產生控制項的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> 事件，模擬使用者按下的動作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example evaluates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> selection and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會評估<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>選取範圍和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: When a specified item is selected from the list box, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.PerformClick%2A> method of another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is called.
trans-unit.target: 從清單方塊中，選取指定的項目時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.PerformClick%2A>另一個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> have been instantiated on a form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>具現化表單上。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic(System.Char)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic(System.Char)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was successfully processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功處理字元，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否能使用 TAB 鍵，將焦點 (Focus) 給予這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can give focus to this control using the TAB key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以使用 TAB 鍵將焦點置於這個控制項則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控制項上文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> that indicates whether it is checked.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否已核取的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 字串表示。
